jumbotron.title: Burn. Better.
jumbotron.description: Burn images to SD cards & USB drives, safely and easily.

callout.title: Start burning your images the easy way

story.para1: Here at resin.io we have thousands of users working through our getting started process and until recently were embarassed about the steps that involved burning an SD card. There was a separate track for each OS (Mac/Windows/Ubuntu) and several manual and error prone steps along the way.
story.para2: To our surprise there was nothing out there that fit our needs. So we built Etcher, an SD card burner app that is simple for end users, extensible for developers, and works on any platform.

topRow.title: Validated Burning
topRow.description: No more writing images on corrupted cards and wondering why your device isn't booting.

topRow.title: Hard-Drive-Friendly
topRow.description: Makes drive selection obvious to avoid wiping your entire hard-drive.

topRow.title: Beautiful Interface
topRow.description: Who said burning SD cards has to be an eyesore?

bottomRow.title: Open-Source
bottomRow.description: Made with JS, HTML, node.js and Electron. Dive in and contribute!

bottomRow.title: Cross-Platform
bottomRow.description: It works for everyone; no more complicated install instructions.
